title: US Inflation Report Comes in Hotter Than Expected, Markets Dip
description: The latest CPI report showed a 0.5% month-over-month increase, surprising economists and sending S&P 500 futures (SPY) down 1.2% in premarket trading.

title: Netflix Stock Jumps 8% on Strong Subscriber Growth in Asia
description: Netflix (NFLX) beat earnings expectations, driven by a surge in new subscribers in its Asia-Pacific (APAC) market, easing concerns over domestic market saturation.

title: Intel Secures $10B Government Contract for New US Chip Fab
description: Intel (INTC) has been awarded a $10 billion contract under the CHIPS Act to construct a new state-of-the-art semiconductor fabrication plant in Ohio.

title: Salesforce Stock Slips as Analyst Downgrades to 'Neutral'
description: Salesforce (CRM) shares fell 3% after a Morgan Stanley analyst downgraded the stock from 'Buy' to 'Neutral', citing slowing growth in its core cloud products.

title: NVIDIA Faces New EU Probe Over AI Chip Market Dominance
description: Regulators in the European Union have opened a formal investigation into NVIDIA (NVDA) over concerns its dominance in the AI chip market stifles competition.

title: US Weekly Jobless Claims Rise Unexpectedly
description: The number of Americans filing new claims for unemployment benefits rose to 230,000 last week, higher than the 215,000 forecast, signaling a cooling labor market.

title: Netflix Signs Exclusive Deal with Major Sports League
description: Netflix (NFLX) has secured its first major live sports package, signing an exclusive 5-year deal to stream NBA Tuesday night games, sources tell CNBC.

title: Fed Chair Powell Signals Rates Will Stay 'Higher for Longer'
description: In a speech, Fed Chair Jerome Powell dashed hopes for an imminent rate cut, stating that the committee needs to see more definitive proof of cooling inflation. Markets (SPY) reacted negatively.

title: Intel's New 'Lunar Lake' Chips Show Promise in Early Benchmarks
description: Early, unverified benchmarks for Intel's (INTC) upcoming 'Lunar Lake' mobile processors show significant gains in power efficiency and AI performance over competitors.

title: NVIDIA Partners with Broadcom on Next-Gen AI Infrastructure
description: NVIDIA (NVDA) and Broadcom (AVGO) announced a strategic partnership to co-develop new networking hardware optimized for massive-scale AI clusters.

title: US Manufacturing PMI Shows Unexpected Contraction
description: The S&P Global Manufacturing PMI for October fell to 49.5, below the 50.0 threshold, indicating a contraction in the sector and raising recession fears.

title: Netflix Raises Prices for Standard and Premium Plans
description: Netflix (NFLX) is increasing the price of its Standard plan by $2 and its Premium plan by $3 per month in the US, its second price hike in 18 months.

title: Intel CEO Pat Gelsinger: 'The AI PC Is the Next Big Thing'
description: In an interview, Intel (INTC) CEO Pat Gelsinger claimed that PCs with built-in neural processing units (NPUs) will represent the most significant PC market shift in decades.

title: NVIDIA (NVDA) Earnings Preview: AI Demand in Focus
description: All eyes are on NVIDIA's (NVDA) Q3 earnings report tomorrow, with Wall Street expecting another record-breaking quarter driven by H100 GPU sales.

title: Consumer Confidence Index Tumbles to 9-Month Low
description: The Conference Board's Consumer Confidence Index fell sharply in October, as persistent inflation and high interest rates weigh on household sentiment.
